verses.kjv: And David spake unto the LORD the words of this song in the day that the LORD had delivered him out of the hand of all his enemies, and out of the hand of Saul:
verses.ct: David sang this song to the LORD on the day the LORD rescued him from all his enemies and from Saul:

verses.kjv: And he said, The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer;
verses.ct: He said, "The LORD is my rock, my fortress, and my rescuer;

verses.kjv: The God of my rock; in him will I trust: he is my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower, and my refuge, my saviour; thou savest me from violence.
verses.ct: my God is my rock — I take refuge in him. He is my shield, the strength of my salvation, my stronghold and my safe place, my savior. You rescue me from violence.

verses.kjv: I will call on the LORD, who is worthy to be praised: so shall I be saved from mine enemies.
verses.ct: I call out to the LORD, who deserves all praise, and I am saved from my enemies.

verses.kjv: When the waves of death compassed me, the floods of ungodly men made me afraid;
verses.ct: The waves of death surrounded me; torrents of destruction overwhelmed me with terror.

verses.kjv: The sorrows of hell compassed me about; the snares of death prevented me;
verses.ct: The cords of the grave wrapped around me; the traps of death confronted me.

verses.kjv: In my distress I called upon the LORD, and cried to my God: and he did hear my voice out of his temple, and my cry did enter into his ears.
verses.ct: In my desperation I called out to the LORD; I cried to my God. From his temple he heard my voice, and my cry reached his ears.

verses.kjv: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations of heaven moved and shook, because he was wroth.
verses.ct: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations of the heavens quaked and shook because he was angry.

verses.kjv: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.
verses.ct: Smoke rose from his nostrils, and consuming fire poured from his mouth; burning coals blazed from it.

verses.kjv: He bowed the heavens also, and came down; and darkness was under his feet.
verses.ct: He parted the heavens and came down, with thick darkness beneath his feet.

verses.kjv: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly: and he was seen upon the wings of the wind.
verses.ct: He mounted a cherub and flew; he soared on the wings of the wind.

verses.kjv: And he made darkness pavilions round about him, dark waters, and thick clouds of the skies.
verses.ct: He wrapped himself in darkness like a canopy — dense clouds and thick storm clouds surrounded him.

verses.kjv: Through the brightness before him were coals of fire kindled.
verses.ct: From the radiance in his presence, coals of fire blazed out.

verses.kjv: The LORD thundered from heaven, and the most High uttered his voice.
verses.ct: The LORD thundered from heaven; the Most High made his voice resound.

verses.kjv: And he sent out arrows, and scattered them; lightning, and discomfited them.
verses.ct: He shot his arrows and scattered them; he hurled lightning and threw them into confusion.

verses.kjv: And the channels of the sea appeared, the foundations of the world were discovered, at the rebuking of the LORD, at the blast of the breath of his nostrils.
verses.ct: The channels of the sea were exposed, and the foundations of the earth were laid bare at the LORD's rebuke, at the blast of breath from his nostrils.

verses.kjv: He sent from above, he took me; he drew me out of many waters;
verses.ct: He reached down from above and took hold of me; he pulled me out of deep waters.

verses.kjv: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them that hated me: for they were too strong for me.
verses.ct: He rescued me from my powerful enemy, from those who hated me — they were too strong for me.

verses.kjv: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the LORD was my stay.
verses.ct: They confronted me on the day of my disaster, but the LORD was my support.

verses.kjv: He brought me forth also into a large place: he delivered me, because he delighted in me.
verses.ct: He brought me out into an open place; he rescued me because he was pleased with me.

verses.kjv: The LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness: according to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me.
verses.ct: The LORD rewarded me for my righteousness; he repaid me because my hands were clean.

verses.kjv: For I have kept the ways of the LORD, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
verses.ct: I have followed the ways of the LORD and have not turned away from my God in wickedness.

verses.kjv: For all his judgments were before me: and as for his statutes, I did not depart from them.
verses.ct: All his laws were constantly in front of me, and I never turned aside from his commands.

verses.kjv: I was also upright before him, and have kept myself from mine iniquity.
verses.ct: I was blameless in his presence and kept myself from sin.

verses.kjv: Therefore the LORD hath recompensed me according to my righteousness; according to my cleanness in his eye sight.
verses.ct: So the LORD has repaid me for my righteousness, for the cleanness of my life in his sight.

verses.kjv: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful, and with the upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright.
verses.ct: To the merciful, you show yourself merciful; to the person of integrity, you show yourself upright.

verses.kjv: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself unsavoury.
verses.ct: To the pure, you show yourself pure; but to the crooked, you show yourself shrewd.

verses.kjv: And the afflicted people thou wilt save: but thine eyes are upon the haughty, that thou mayest bring them down.
verses.ct: You save humble people, but your eyes are on the arrogant to bring them low.

verses.kjv: For thou art my lamp, O LORD: and the LORD will lighten my darkness.
verses.ct: You are my lamp, LORD; the LORD turns my darkness into light.

verses.kjv: For by thee I have run through a troop: by my God have I leaped over a wall.
verses.ct: With your help I can charge against an army; with my God I can scale a wall.

verses.kjv: As for God, his way is perfect; the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all them that trust in him.
verses.ct: As for God, his way is flawless; the word of the LORD has been proven true. He is a shield for everyone who trusts in him.

verses.kjv: For who is God, save the LORD? and who is a rock, save our God?
verses.ct: For who is God besides the LORD? And who is a rock except our God?

verses.kjv: God is my strength and power: and he maketh my way perfect.
verses.ct: God is my strength and power, and he clears a perfect path for me.

verses.kjv: He maketh my feet like hinds’ feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
verses.ct: He makes my feet as sure as a deer's and sets me securely on the heights.

verses.kjv: He teacheth my hands to war; so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.
verses.ct: He trains my hands for battle so that my arms can bend a bow of bronze.

verses.kjv: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy gentleness hath made me great.
verses.ct: You have given me the shield of your salvation, and your gentleness has made me great.

verses.kjv: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me; so that my feet did not slip.
verses.ct: You have made the path wide beneath my feet so that my ankles never gave way.

verses.kjv: I have pursued mine enemies, and destroyed them; and turned not again until I had consumed them.
verses.ct: I chased my enemies and destroyed them; I did not turn back until they were finished.

verses.kjv: And I have consumed them, and wounded them, that they could not arise: yea, they are fallen under my feet.
verses.ct: I crushed them and struck them down so they could not get up; they fell beneath my feet.

verses.kjv: For thou hast girded me with strength to battle: them that rose up against me hast thou subdued under me.
verses.ct: You equipped me with strength for battle; you forced those who rose against me to bow down before me.

verses.kjv: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies, that I might destroy them that hate me.
verses.ct: You made my enemies turn their backs to me in retreat, and I destroyed those who hated me.

verses.kjv: They looked, but there was none to save; even unto the LORD, but he answered them not.
verses.ct: They looked for help, but no one came to save them; they even cried out to the LORD, but he did not answer them.

verses.kjv: Then did I beat them as small as the dust of the earth, I did stamp them as the mire of the street, and did spread them abroad.
verses.ct: I ground them as fine as dust on the ground; I crushed them and trampled them like mud in the streets.

verses.kjv: Thou also hast delivered me from the strivings of my people, thou hast kept me to be head of the heathen: a people which I knew not shall serve me.
verses.ct: You also rescued me from conflicts among my own people; you preserved me as ruler over nations. People I had never known now serve me.

verses.kjv: Strangers shall submit themselves unto me: as soon as they hear, they shall be obedient unto me.
verses.ct: Foreigners cringe before me; the moment they hear of me, they obey.

verses.kjv: Strangers shall fade away, and they shall be afraid out of their close places.
verses.ct: Foreigners lose their courage and come trembling out of their fortresses.

verses.kjv: The LORD liveth; and blessed be my rock; and exalted be the God of the rock of my salvation.
verses.ct: The LORD lives! Praise be to my rock! May God, the rock of my salvation, be lifted high!

verses.kjv: It is God that avengeth me, and that bringeth down the people under me,
verses.ct: He is the God who avenges me and brings nations under my authority,

verses.kjv: And that bringeth me forth from mine enemies: thou also hast lifted me up on high above them that rose up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.
verses.ct: who frees me from my enemies. You have raised me above those who attacked me; you have rescued me from violent men.

verses.kjv: Therefore I will give thanks unto thee, O LORD, among the heathen, and I will sing praises unto thy name.
verses.ct: For this reason I will praise you among the nations, LORD, and I will sing praises to your name.

verses.kjv: He is the tower of salvation for his king: and sheweth mercy to his anointed, unto David, and to his seed for evermore.
verses.ct: He is a tower of salvation for his king; he shows mercy to his anointed — to David and his descendants forever."
